282        
283//      private final boolean[][] Q; 
284        private int iterations = -1;    // iterations performed in last applyTo()
285        
286        public BinaryThinning() {
287//              this.Q = makeDeletionCodeTable();
288        }
289        
290        // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
291        
292        @Override
293        public void applyTo(ByteProcessor ip) {
294                int iMax = ip.getWidth() + ip.getHeight();
295                applyTo(ip, iMax);
296        }
297        
298        public void applyTo(ByteProcessor ip, int iMax) {
299                int nd;
300                int iter = 0;
301                do {
302                        nd = thinOnce(ip);
303                        iter++;
304                } while (nd > 0 && iter <  iMax);
305                this.iterations = iter;
306        }
307        
308        public int getIterations() {
309                if (iterations < 0) {
310                        throw new IllegalStateException("no iteration count available, call applyTo() first");
311                }
312                return iterations;
313        }
314        
315        // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
316        
317        // Single thinning iteration. Returns the number of deletions performed (for debugging only).
318        public int thinOnce(ByteProcessor ip) {
319                final int M = ip.getWidth();
320                final int N = ip.getHeight();
321                final List<PntInt> D = new ArrayList<>();
322//              final byte[] NH = new byte[8];
323                int n = 0;
324                for (int pass = 0; pass < 2; pass++) {  // make 2 passes
325                        D.clear();
326                        for (int u = 0; u < M; u++) {
327                                for (int v = 0; v < N; v++) {
328                                        if (ip.get(u, v) > 0) {
329//                                              get8Neighborhood(ip, u, v, NH);
330//                                              int c = get8NeighborhoodIndex(NH);
331                                                int c = get8NeighborhoodIndex(ip, u, v);
332                                                if (Q[c][pass]) {
333                                                        D.add(PntInt.from(u, v));
334                                                        n = n + 1;
335                                                }
336                                        }
337                                }
338                        }                       
339                        for (PntInt p : D) {
340                                ip.putPixel(p.x, p.y, 0);
341                        }
342
343                }
344                return n;
345        }
346        
347        @SuppressWarnings("unused")
348        private void get8Neighborhood(ByteProcessor I, int u, int v, byte[] NH) {
349                NH[0] =  binarize(I.getPixel(u+1, v));
350                NH[1] =  binarize(I.getPixel(u+1, v-1));
351                NH[2] =  binarize(I.getPixel(u, v-1));
352                NH[3] =  binarize(I.getPixel(u-1, v-1));
353                NH[4] =  binarize(I.getPixel(u-1, v));
354                NH[5] =  binarize(I.getPixel(u-1, v+1));
355                NH[6] =  binarize(I.getPixel(u, v+1));
356                NH[7] =  binarize(I.getPixel(u+1, v+1));
357        }
358        
359        @SuppressWarnings("unused")
360        private int get8NeighborhoodIndex(byte[] NH) {
361//              int c = 0;
362//              for (int i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
363//                      if (NH[i] != 0) {
364//                              c = c | (1 << i);
365//                      }
366//              }
367//              return c;       // c = 0,...,255
368                return NH[0] + NH[1] * 2 + NH[2] * 4 + NH[3] * 8 + NH[4] * 16 
369                                + NH[5] * 32 + NH[6] * 64 + NH[7] * 128;
370        }
371        
372        // get neighborhood index directly, without extracting neighborhood vector itself:
373        private int get8NeighborhoodIndex(ByteProcessor I, int u, int v) {
374                int c = 0;
375                if (I.getPixel(u+1, v)   != 0)  c+= 1;          // NH[0]
376                if (I.getPixel(u+1, v-1) != 0)  c+= 2;          // NH[1]
377                if (I.getPixel(u, v-1)   != 0)  c+= 4;          // NH[2]
378                if (I.getPixel(u-1, v-1) != 0)  c+= 8;          // NH[3]
379                if (I.getPixel(u-1, v)   != 0)  c+= 16;         // NH[4]
380                if (I.getPixel(u-1, v+1) != 0)  c+= 32;         // NH[5]
381                if (I.getPixel(u, v+1)   != 0)  c+= 64;         // NH[6]
382                if (I.getPixel(u+1, v+1) != 0)  c+= 128;        // NH[7]
383                return c;       // c = 0,...,255
384        }
385
386        // --------------------------------------------------------------
387        
388        // only used once to calculate Q
389        @SuppressWarnings("unused")
390        private static boolean[][] makeDeletionCodeTable() {
391                boolean[][] Q = new boolean[256][2];
392                for (int i = 0; i < 256; i++) {
393                        byte[] N = new byte[8];
394                        for (int j = 0; j < 8; j++) {
395                                N[j] = ((i & (1 << j)) != 0) ? B1 : B0;         // test bit j of i
396                        }
397//                      System.out.format("%d: %s\n", i, Arrays.toString(N));
398                        Q[i][0] = R1(N);
399                        Q[i][1] = R2(N);
400                }               
401                return Q;
402        }
403        
404        // --------------------------------------------------------------
405
406        private static byte binarize(int i) {
407                return (i == 0) ? B0 : B1;
408        }
409
410        private static boolean R1(byte[] NH) {
411                final int b = B(NH);
412                final int c = C(NH);
413                return 
414                        //NH[0] == 1 &&
415                        2 <= b && b <= 6 &&
416                        c == 1 &&
417                        NH[6] * NH[0] * NH[2] == 0 &&
418                        NH[4] * NH[6] * NH[0] == 0;
419        }
420        
421        private static boolean R2(byte[] NH) {
422                final int b = B(NH);
423                final int c = C(NH);
424                return 
425                        //NH[0] == 1 &&
426                        2 <= b && b <= 6 &&
427                        c == 1 &&
428                        NH[0] * NH[2] * NH[4] == 0 &&
429                                NH[2] * NH[4] * NH[6] == 0;
430        }
431        
432        private static int B(byte[] NH) {
433                return NH[0] + NH[1] + NH[2] + NH[3] + NH[4] + NH[5] + NH[6] + NH[7];
434        }
435        
436        private static int C(byte[] NH) { // NH = (N0, N1, N2, N3, N4, N5, N6, N7)
437                int c = 0;
438                for (int i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
439                        c = c + NH[i] * (NH[i] - NH[(i+1) % 8]);
440                }
441                return c;
442        }
443
444
